title: Hiring Success '17 | SmartRecruiters
text:
Erwan Menard President and COOScality 
Elaine Orler CEO and FounderTalent Function THE BIGGEST EVENT IN RECRUITING Inspiring Thought Leadership 
Our speakers are industry leaders who bring thought provoking perspectives on talent acquisition to help take your game to the next level. Make Plans & Relationships 
Share insights and best practices with 300+ talent acquisition leaders. Attend Success Circles and our Genius Bar to work with peers on your top issues. Valuable Education & Certification 
You will gain the knowledge and power to make your SmartRecruiters system sing, returning to your office as a recruiting rockstar. 
Attend JUSTIFY YOUR TRIP 
Getting new ideas, returning with a plan, and getting better use of your tools will improve your hiring, and is a great use of company resources. Here is a simple template that you can use to get approval for the trip.
